text.div:
CancerPrimaryOrRecurrence

Indicates whether a new primary cancer or a regional recurrence or distant metastases.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    314966008Local recurrence of malignant tumour of rectum
    314965007Local recurrence of malignant tumour of colon
    25173007Recurrent tumour
    399409002Distant metastasis present
  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.hl7.org.au/fhir/rcpa/CodeSystem/cancer-primary-or-recurrence

name: CancerPrimaryOrRecurrence
description: Indicates whether a new primary cancer or a regional recurrence or distant metastases.
